SEARCH
Package model.Components

Class ComponentDeclaration

java.lang.Object
model.Components.AlgorithmComponent
model.Components.ComponentDeclaration
public class ComponentDeclaration extends AlgorithmComponent

This class represents the assign component.

This component is used whenever a variable has to be initialized and saved in the memory

      The constructor of the class ComponentDeclaration

      It creates a new instance of the class

      Parameters:
      nextComponent1 - The component that is going to be pointed by default by the component
      nextComponent2 - The component that is going to be pointed if a condition is false
      MS - The memory that is shared in the program

    • printCode

      public ArrayList<Line> printCode(String language)
      Description copied from class: AlgorithmComponent

      This method will be called from every instance of any class that extends this class

      This method needs to be overridden by the single child classes for proper functionality and it will translate the informations contained in the instances to different programming languages such as Python, Java and PseudoCode

      Overrides:
      printCode in class AlgorithmComponent
      Parameters:
      language - The language that it needs to be translated in

      Possible values:

      • "Python"
      • "Java"
      • "PseudoCode"
      Returns:
      ArrayList of Lines, with all the lines of code generated for the language
